testcase.name: Verify I can add a new user with the web app ui
Verify I can add a new user with special characters in the username
Verify that username is mandatory when adding a new user
Verify that email is mandatory when adding a new user
Verify that birthdate is mandatory when adding a new user
Verify that address is mandatory when adding a new user
Verify that it is not possible add an user with an invalid email address
Verify that it is not possible add an user with a birthdate later than today
